126  void MoveFrame(int n) {

129 
130  void Write(int fd) {
131 
132  // Write header
133  unsigned int len = strlen(typeid (*this).name()) + 1;
134  write(fd, &len, sizeof (unsigned int));
135  write(fd, typeid (*this).name(), strlen(typeid (*this).name()) + 1);
136 
137  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "Writing class %s header=%d", typeid (*this).name(), len);
138 
139 
140  // Write data
141  unsigned int d1, d2;
142  d1 = mData.size1();
143  d2 = mData.size2();
144  write(fd, &d1, sizeof (unsigned int));
145  write(fd, &d2, sizeof (unsigned int));
146  write(fd, &mData(0, 0), d1 * d2 * sizeof (numericType));
147  write(fd, &mScale, sizeof (double));
148  write(fd, &mStart, sizeof (double));
149  write(fd, &mSampling, sizeof (double));
150  }
151 
152  void Read(int fd) {
153  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "Reading class %s", typeid (*this).name());
154  // Get header
155  unsigned int len;
156  char name[256];
157 
158  read(fd, &len, sizeof (unsigned int));
159  if (len > 256) {
160  LogSevere("Read: header too large: %d", len);
161  throw std::runtime_error("Read: header too large");
162  }
163  read(fd, name, len);
164  if (strcmp(name, typeid (*this).name()) != 0) {
165  LogSevere("Read: expecting class %s, got class %s",
166  typeid (*this).name(),
167  name);
168  throw std::runtime_error("Read: got bad class");
169  }
170 
171  // Get data
172  unsigned int d1, d2;
173  read(fd, &d1, sizeof (unsigned int));
174  read(fd, &d2, sizeof (unsigned int));
175  mData.resize(d1, d2);
176  read(fd, &mData(0, 0), d1 * d2 * sizeof (numericType));
177  read(fd, &mScale, sizeof (double));
178  read(fd, &mStart, sizeof (double));
179  read(fd, &mSampling, sizeof (double));
180  }

201  numericType& operator()(unsigned int f) {
202  if (mScale != 1.0) Rescale();
203  return mData(0, f);
204  };

206 
214 
215  numericType get(double x) {
216  if (mScale != 1.0) Rescale();
217  unsigned int i = (unsigned int) ((x - mStart) / mSampling);
218  if (i >= mData.size2()) i = mData.size2() - 1;
219  return mData(0, i);
220  };
221 
222 
231 
232  numericType get(unsigned int c, double x) {
233  if (mScale != 1.0) Rescale();
234  unsigned int i = (unsigned int) ((x - mStart) / mSampling);
235  if (i >= mData.size2()) i = mData.size2() - 1;
236  return mData(c, i);
237  };

280  template<class MA>
281  numericType& asMatrix(unsigned int i, unsigned int j, unsigned int f) {
282  if (mScale != 1.0) Rescale();
283  unsigned int lda = MA::Dimension(mData.size1());
284  return mData(MA::Map(i, j, lda), f);

417  void Fill(numericType v) {
418  mScale = 1.0;
419  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mData.size1(); i++) {
420  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mData.size2(); j++) {
421  mData(i, j) = v;
422  }
423  }
424  };
425  void FillPoint(unsigned int i, unsigned int j, numericType v) {
426  mScale = 1.0;
427 
428  mData(i, j) = v;
429 
430  };
431 
432  void SetData(FrVect* frv) {
433  if ((mData.size1() != 1) || (mData.size2() != frv->nData)) {
434  mData.resize(1, frv->nData);
435  }
436  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
437  mData(0, i) = numericType(frv->dataD[i]);
438  }
439  mScale = 1.0;
440  mStart = frv->GTime;
441  mSampling = *(frv->dx);
442  };
443 
444  void SetDataF(FrVect* frv, double offset) {
445  if ((mData.size1() != 1) || (mData.size2() != frv->nData)) {
446  mData.resize(1, frv->nData);
447  }
448 
449  double slope = mScale;
450  switch (frv->type) {
451  case FR_VECT_C:
452  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
453  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->data[ i ]) * slope + offset);
454  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
455  }
456  break;
457  case FR_VECT_2S:
458  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
459  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataS[ i ]) * slope + offset);
460  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
461 
462  }
463  break;
464  case FR_VECT_4S:
465  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
466  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataI[ i ]) * slope + offset);
467  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
468  }
469  break;
470  case FR_VECT_8S:
471  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
472  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataL[ i ]) * slope + offset);
473  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
474 
475  }
476  break;
477  case FR_VECT_1U:
478  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
479  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataU[ i ]) * slope + offset);
480  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
481 
482  }
483  break;
484  case FR_VECT_2U:
485  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
486  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataUS[ i ]) * slope + offset);
487  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
488 
489  }
490  break;
491  case FR_VECT_4U:
492  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
493  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataUI[ i ]) * slope + offset);
494  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
495 
496  }
497  break;
498  case FR_VECT_8U:
499  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
500  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataUL[ i ]) * slope + offset);
501  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
502 
503  }
504  break;
505  case FR_VECT_4R:
506  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
507  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataF[ i ]) * slope + offset);
508  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
509 
510  }
511  break;
512  case FR_VECT_8R:
513  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < frv->nData; i++) {
514  mData(0, i) = ((double) (frv->dataD[ i ]) * slope + offset);
515  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_3, "PUSH %20.20g %20.20g", mStart, mData(0, i));
516  }
517  break;
518  default:
519  LogSevere("FrVectCopy: unknown type");
520  throw std::runtime_error("FdChannel::Channel::PushFrVect - unknown type");
521  }
522

524  };

532 
533  void Rescale() {
534  mData *= mScale;
535  mScale = 1.0;
536  };
